hero.tagline:
A cocktail to share.
 Memories to create.

cocktail.title: The Cocktail
cocktail.subtitle: Every glass tells a story
cocktail.description: Dix Huit Zéro Cinq is a sunny, accessible cocktail, designed for pleasure and sharing.
cocktail.recipe:
1/3 Dix Huit Zéro Cinq cocktail, 2/3 tropical juice.
 To boost your cocktail, add 1/3 sparkling drink!

story.intro: Dix Huit Zéro Cinq is much more than a cocktail. It's a story we share, passed down through the years, designed to accompany and celebrate life's most beautiful moments.
story.babou: After the war, my grandmother, a strong and independent woman called Babou, used the back of her shop to create her own cocktail recipes, sharing them with everyone around her.
story.birth: Among them, a very special recipe was born on May 18, 1994. The same day as me. At the time, in my mother's belly, no one knew my gender yet. Everyone called me the Pacha.
story.creation: That day, my grandmother created this cocktail, not knowing we were being born together.
story.tradition: Every year, on my birthday, Dix Huit Zéro Cinq was part of the celebration. It accompanied the most beautiful moments of my life: our summers, our laughter, and even my wedding.
story.mission: Seeing the enthusiasm, it became clear to my father and me that it was time to share it beyond our family circle, to keep this story alive.

positioning.description: Dix Huit Zéro Cinq is for those who seek products with meaning, memories and emotion. A cocktail that is lived more than explained. An excuse to reconnect, slow down and enjoy the moment.
